augBlueprint.name: NANO_MEDBAY

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_HARD
The Kestrel
shipBlueprint.desc: This class of ship was decommissioned from Federation service years ago. After a number of refits and updates this classic ship is ready for battle.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_HARD_2
Red-Tail
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Kestrel Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: This modified Kestrel class ship was created by a laser weapon aficionado.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_MANTIS
The Gila Monster
shipBlueprint.unlock: The famous Mantis thief, KazaaakplethKilik, owns this ship. You'll have to "convince" him to help you.
shipBlueprint.desc: This warship is designed to enhance its crew for close combat missions.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_MANTIS_2
The Basilisk
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Mantis Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: This warship encourages sending massive boarding parties and keeping strong defenses.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_STEALTH
The Nesasio
shipBlueprint.unlock: This ship is being built near the Engi homeworlds. To unlock it you'll need to help them, but they only trust their own kind.
shipBlueprint.desc: Constructed for the Federation by the Engi, this ship is designed to use cloaking technology and speed to get behind enemy lines.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_STEALTH_2
DA-SR 12
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Stealth Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: Built like a glass cannon, this ship is hard to handle. If its cloaking can keep it safe long enough to charge its weapon, few cruisers can withstand its might.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_CIRCLE
The Torus
shipBlueprint.unlock: To unlock this Engi ship you'll need to get to the 5th sector with any layout of the Kestrel.
shipBlueprint.desc: Although it may look like a pile of junk loosely held together, this well designed ship relies on drones and ion weaponry.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_CIRCLE_2
The Vortex
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Engi Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: Heavily understaffed, this ship relies on drones to keep the ship running.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_FED
The Osprey
shipBlueprint.unlock: There have been rumors of advanced ship construction in the Rebel Stronghold...
shipBlueprint.desc: This ship features the latest in Federation technology: an advanced beam weapon that pierces through shields.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_FED_2
Nisos
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Federation Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: This ship starts with additional Artillery power, encouraging heavy reliance on the beam.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_JELLY
Man of War
shipBlueprint.unlock: One of the slug ships must know something about this advanced cruiser. Perhaps you can "convince" them to tell you.
shipBlueprint.desc: Designed for use inside nebulas, this cruiser lacks sensors and relies instead on the guile and cunning of the Slugs.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_JELLY_2
The Stormwalker
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Slug Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: This boarding ship has no medical facilities and must manage its explosives carefully to keep the crew alive.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_ROCK
Bulwark
shipBlueprint.unlock: Prove yourself to the Rockmen to earn this powerful cruiser.
shipBlueprint.desc: Similar to its designers, this super-dense behemoth uses brute force to overwhelm its foes.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_ROCK_2
Shivan
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Rock Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: With no airlocks, this ship must rely entirely on its rock crew to put out fires.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_ENERGY
The Adjudicator
shipBlueprint.unlock: Learn from the Zoltan that sometimes diplomacy works.
shipBlueprint.desc: The Zoltan's advanced shields technology gives this ship an edge during each battle.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_ENERGY_2
Noether
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Zoltan Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: This ship starts with a weakened Shield system and must rely on its supershield.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_CRYSTAL
Bravais
shipBlueprint.unlock: Travel to a lost sector of the galaxy to find this powerful vessel.
shipBlueprint.desc: This powerful vessel is powered by the secret technologies of the lost Crystalline Beings.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_CRYSTAL_2
Carnelian
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Crystal Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: Their unique racial ability makes the Crystal beings very adept at ship boarding. This ship was designed for such raiding parties.
